title: Google\Cloud\Core\RequestWrapper
name: RequestWrapper
description: The RequestWrapper is responsible for delivering and signing requests.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration options. Please see Google\Cloud\Core\RequestWrapperTrait::setCommonDefaults() for the other available options.

params.name: config.componentVersion
params.description: The current version of the component from which the request originated.

params.name: config.accessToken
params.description: Access token used to sign requests.

params.name: config.asyncHttpHandler
params.description: Experimental A handler used to deliver PSR-7 requests asynchronously. Function signature should match: function (RequestInterface $request, array $options = []) : PromiseInterface<ResponseInterface>.

params.name: config.authHttpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver PSR-7 requests specifically for authentication. Function signature should match: function (RequestInterface $request, array $options = []) : ResponseInterface.

params.name: config.httpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver PSR-7 requests. Function signature should match: function (RequestInterface $request, array $options = []) : ResponseInterface.

params.name: config.restOptions
params.description: HTTP client specific configuration options.

params.name: config.shouldSignRequest
params.description: Whether to enable request signing.

params.name: config.restRetryFunction
params.description: Sets the conditions for whether or not a request should attempt to retry. Function signature should match: function (\Exception $ex) : bool.

params.name: config.restDelayFunction
params.description: Executes a delay, defaults to utilizing usleep. Function signature should match: function (int $delay) : void.

params.name: config.restCalcDelayFunction
params.description: Sets the conditions for determining how long to wait between attempts to retry. Function signature should match: function (int $attempt) : int.

params.name: request
params.description: A PSR-7 request.

params.name: options
params.description: Request options.

params.name: options.requestTimeout
params.description: Seconds to wait before timing out the request. Defaults to 0.

params.name: options.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

params.name: options.restRetryFunction
params.description: Sets the conditions for whether or not a request should attempt to retry. Function signature should match: function (\Exception $ex) : bool.

params.name: options.restDelayFunction
params.description: Executes a delay, defaults to utilizing usleep. Function signature should match: function (int $delay) : void.

params.name: options.restCalcDelayFunction
params.description: Sets the conditions for determining how long to wait between attempts to retry. Function signature should match: function (int $attempt) : int.

params.name: options.restOptions
params.description: HTTP client specific configuration options.

params.name: request
params.description: A PSR-7 request.

params.name: options
params.description: Request options.

params.name: options.requestTimeout
params.description: Seconds to wait before timing out the request. Defaults to 0.

params.name: options.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

params.name: options.restRetryFunction
params.description: Sets the conditions for whether or not a request should attempt to retry. Function signature should match: function (\Exception $ex, int $retryAttempt) : bool.

params.name: options.restDelayFunction
params.description: Executes a delay, defaults to utilizing usleep. Function signature should match: function (int $delay) : void.

params.name: options.restCalcDelayFunction
params.description: Sets the conditions for determining how long to wait between attempts to retry. Function signature should match: function (int $attempt) : int.

params.name: options.restOptions
params.description: HTTP client specific configuration options.

methods.name: setCommonDefaults
methods.description:
Sets common defaults between request wrappers.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Core\RequestWrapperTrait

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: config.authCache
params.description: A cache for storing access tokens. Defaults to a simple in memory implementation.

params.name: config.authCacheOptions
params.description: Cache configuration options.

params.name: config.credentialsFetcher
params.description: A credentials fetcher instance.

params.name: config.keyFile
params.description: The contents of the service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developer's Console. Ex: json_decode(file_get_contents($path), true).

params.name: config.requestTimeout
params.description: Seconds to wait before timing out the request. Defaults to 0 with REST and 60 with gRPC.

params.name: config.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

params.name: config.scopes
params.description: Scopes to be used for the request.

params.name: config.quotaProject
params.description: Specifies a user project to bill for access charges associated with the request.

methods.name: getCredentialsFetcher
methods.description:
Gets the credentials fetcher and sets up caching. Precedence is as follows:

  • A user supplied credentials fetcher instance.
  • Credentials created from a keyfile.
  • Application default credentials.
  • Anonymous credentials.
Implemented in Google\Cloud\Core\RequestWrapperTrait
